thread.title: PETER & KIM LOUCKS
thread.title_full: InnoMax reviewed by PETER & KIM LOUCKS

author: PETER & KIM LOUCKS
title: PETER & KIM LOUCKS
text: I wasn't a believer of this miracle mattress that would improve my sleep and overall feeling. My husband drug me to the store after bugging me for 6 months. We have had our innomax bed for 3 weeks now and I cannot believe the difference it makes. I can't wait to go to bed at night and don't want to get up in the morning. It's wonderful!
